trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When you create a ListCommandEventHandler delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的 ListCommandEventHandler 委派<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控制項，必須識別處理事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>時產生的項目事件通知的處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For default rendering, the control provides a UI that allows the user to click individual list items.
trans-unit.target: 預設轉譯控制項提供 UI，讓使用者可以按一下個別清單項目。

trans-unit.source: On postback, the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A> event handler, with an argument pointing to the source item.
trans-unit.target: 在回傳時，控制項會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>事件處理常式，以指向來源項目的引數。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property is `null`.
When rendering with a template, the event bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 的事件反昇機制呈現時使用範本，呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed a parameter, pointing to the source item, and to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式收到的參數，指向到來源項目，以及<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>產生事件的控制項屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您呈現單一清單項目具有多個相關聯的互動。

trans-unit.source: To render an item as a hyperlink, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要轉譯為超連結的項目，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property is used for display, and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> property are used as the target link address when selected.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>屬性可顯示和內容<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A>屬性會當做時選取的目標連結位址。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Command events will not be generated for these links.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 命令事件就不會產生這些連結。
